headline: How Investors May Respond To Genpact (G) Winning Key AI-First Banking and Brand Leadership Honors
summary: In recent weeks, Genpact was named a Leader in Everest Group’s 2025 Banking Operations PEAK Matrix Assessment and recognized in the 2026 Brand Finance IT Services 25 report for its stronger IT services brand. These accolades highlight how Genpact’s pivot to AI-first banking operations and its global rebrand are sharpening its position as a technology-led transformation partner. We will now examine how Genpact’s AI-first banking capabilities and elevated brand standing shape the company’s...
